tutor_bonus_values.title: Tutor a Sesh
tutor_bonus_values.description:
The length of Sesh does not matter.

No points are awarded for cancelled Seshes.

tutor_bonus_values.title: Refer a Tutor
tutor_bonus_values.description:
Using your referral code found within the Promote page of the app, have a friend or classmate sign up to tutor and add classes to their profile!

Your referral does not have to have a Sesh for points to be awarded.
